description: This strawberry oat smoothie is made with rich coconut milk, juicy strawberries and healthy oats. It's rich, creamy and completely satisfying!
name: Strawberry Oat Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
1/2 cup coconut milk (or another 1/2 cup soy or almond milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Place bananas, strawberries and oats in blender and blend until smooth, stopping to scrape down sides of pitcher as needed.
Add remaining ingredients and blend until smooth.
